solution_line_template: The two shorter CDs have a combined length of {short_cd_length}*{num_short_cds}=<<{short_cd_length}*{num_short_cds}={combined_short_cds_length}>>{combined_short_cds_length} hours
So in total the CDs had a length of {long_cd_length}+{combined_short_cds_length}= <<{long_cd_length}+{combined_short_cds_length}={total_length}>>{total_length} hours
